titleStmt.title: An admirable treatise of solid virtue ... by Antonia Bourignon ; written in 24 letters to a young man, who sought after the perfection of his soul ... ; translated from the original French.
Traitté admirable de la solide vertu. English.
titleStmt.author: Bourignon, Antoinette, 1616-1680.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Traitté admirable de la solide vertu.
"Catalogue of books composed by Mrs. Antonia Bourignon": p. [59].
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
